name: Cleaners Do Us Part
description: Cleaners Do Us Part is a text adventure game that puts you into the shoes of an agent unit called the Cleaners. You play as Agent 311, a soldier who recently lost his team to the infection nicknamed the “Hive”. With help from an AI system in his helmet, he goes back to the horrors of his team's demise and attempts to gather their audio logs of their final breath. Do what you need to do Agent.
